character.name: Bucket
description: An inventor. Her cards generate a lot of <c=downside>trash</c>, but allow for <c=keyword>more reliable hands</c>.

favorite.name: My favorite
favorite.description: This card deals +2 damage. While in your deck, <c=downside>all other cards deal -1 damage.</c>

exhaustTrashFromHand.name: EXHAUST TRASH IN HAND
exhaustTrashFromHand.description: Send every <c=trash>trash</c> card in your hand to the exhaust pile.

description.trash: Pick a card from your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> and discard it. If it's <c=trash>trash</c>, shoot for <c=keyword>{{Damage}}</c> damage.
description.nontrash: Pick a card from your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> and discard it. If it's not <c=trash>trash</c>, shoot for <c=keyword>{{Damage}}</c> damage.
description.default: Pick a card from your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> and discard it.

cardSelectText.trash: Pick a card. Discard it. If it's <c=trash>trash</c>, shoot for <c=keyword>{{Damage}}</c> damage.
cardSelectText.nontrash: Pick a card. Discard it. If it's not <c=trash>trash</c>, shoot for <c=keyword>{{Damage}}</c> damage.

makeFavorite.name: make your favorite
makeFavorite.cardSelectText: Pick a card to make <c=cardtrait>your favorite</c>, increasing its damage.

Salvage.name: Salvage
Salvage.description: At the start of each turn, gain {0} <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> per <c=trash>trash</c> card in your hand.

SteamCover.name: Steam Cover
SteamCover.description: Each turn, add {0} <c=card>Fumes</c> to your draw pile.

Ingenuity.name: Ingenuity
Ingenuity.description: Draw {0} extra card(s) at the start of each turn.

XRayVision.name: X-RAY VISION
XRayVision.description: View the order in which you draw cards from your draw pile.

Doohicky.name: DOOHICKY
Doohicky.description: At the start of each turn, if there's a <c=trash>trash</c> card in your hand, <c=action>draw 1 card</c>.

Workaround.name: WORKAROUND
Workaround.description: On your first turn, gain 1 <c=status>REDRAW</c> for every 4 cards in your deck.

RecyclingBin.name: RECYCLING BIN
RecyclingBin.description: Each turn, draw <c=card>+1 card</c> if a <c=cardtrait>recycle</c> card was played the previous turn.

Shredder.name: SHREDDER
Shredder.description: Spending a redraw on a card exhausts it. <c=downside>Draw 1 less card each turn.</c>

Favoritism.name: FAVORITISM
Favoritism.description: Choose a card in your deck that deals damage. It becomes <c=cardtrait>your favorite</c>.

ReturnToSender.name: RETURN TO SENDER
ReturnToSender.description: Played cards are put into the draw pile rather than the discard pile.

JuryRigging.name: JURY-RIGGING
JuryRigging.description: Every 2 <c=trash>trash</c> cards exhausted, gain a <c=card>Chip Shot</c>.

CerebralShield.name: CEREBRAL SHIELD
CerebralShield.description: At the end of each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> for each 3 <c=status>REDRAW</c>.

Ruminating.name: RUMINATING
Ruminating.description: Card draw on all actions is replaced by an equal amount of <c=status>REDRAW</c> gain.

AirlockEjector.name: AIRLOCK EJECTOR
AirlockEjector.description: Whenever a <c=trash>trash</c> card is played, launch an <c=drone>asteroid</c> from the missile bay.

WizbosCurse.name: WIZBO'S CURSE
WizbosCurse.description: For each <c=status>HEAT</c> a non-<c=trash>trash</c> card would apply to you, add a <c=card>Miasma</c> into your hand instead.

ProcessorChip.name: PROCESSOR CHIP
ProcessorChip.description: At the start of combat, gain an <c=cardtrait>exhausting</c> <c=card>Smart Steering A</c>.

DiamondInTheRough.name: DIAMOND IN THE ROUGH
DiamondInTheRough.description: At the end of each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c> for each <c=trash>trash</c> card in your hand.

ScavengerSight.name: SCAVENGER-SIGHT
ScavengerSight.description: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> and 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> on the first turn for each <c=trash>trash</c> card in your deck. <c=downside>Basic shot, basic dodge, basic block, and non-temp <c=trash>trash</c> cards can appear in combat rewards.</c>

ModusOperandi.name: MODUS OPERANDI
ModusOperandi.description: On pickup, choose 2 cards that are not <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c> in your deck. They gain <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c>.

LittleHelpers.name: LITTLE HELPERS
LittleHelpers.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a <c=card>Nanobots</c> into your deck. Whenever you draw <c=card>Nanobots</c>, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> and 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Safety Override</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Attack for {{Damage}} damage. Add a <c=card>Safety Override</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>redraw</c>. Add a <c=card>Price of Progress</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>redraw</c>. Add a <c=card>Price of Progress</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Gain {{Amount}} <c=status>redraw</c>. Add a <c=card>Trash</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Gain 2 <c=energy>energy</c>. Add an <c=card>Oxygen Leak</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Gain 3 <c=energy>energy</c>. Add an <c=card>Oxygen Leak</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None:
Discard 3 cards from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>
Deal {{Damage}} dmg per non-<c=trash>trash</c> card.
description.A:
Discard 3 cards from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>
Deal {{Damage}} dmg per non-<c=trash>trash</c> card.
description.B:
Discard 3 cards from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c>
Deal {{Damage}} dmg per <c=trash>trash</c> card.

description.None: Play the top card of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> for free.
description.A: Play the top card of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> for free.
description.B: Choose a card in your <c=keyword>draw pile</c> to play for free.

description.None: Draw 3. Put a card in <c=keyword>hand</c> on top of your draw pile.
description.A: Draw 3. Put a card in <c=keyword>hand</c> on top of your draw pile.
description.B: Draw 5. Put a card in your <c=keyword>hand</c> on top of your draw pile.
Gain 2 <c=status>autopilot</c>. Add a <c=card>Price of Progress</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

description.None: Gain 1 <c=status>autopilot</c>. Add a <c=card>Smart Steering</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Gain 3 <c=status>autopilot</c>. Add a <c=card>Smart Steering</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

description.None:
<c=keyword>When flipped, move to the {{Dir}} of
your hand.</c>
description.A: Move {{InvDir}} 1 space. <c=keyword>When flipped, move to the {{Dir}} of your hand.</c>
description.B: Gain 1 <c=status>temp shield</c>. <c=keyword>When flipped, move to the {{Dir}} of your hand.</c>
